publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
You can ask alexa for shabbat times in various cities in the united states, the united kingdom or in israel.
Note the skill is very interactive, the follow up questions differ based on the customer's answers.
It will, for example, return a different answer for ending a session with 'no', or 'no thank you'.

en-US.summary: Would you like to know the shabbat times in your city?
examplePhrases: Alexa ask shabbat times for the shabbat times in new york
Alexa ask shabbat times to list all the city names in israel
Alexa ask shabbat times about tel aviv
en-US.name: Shabbat Times
en-US.description: Get the Shabbat start and end times in various cities in the Israel, the United States and the United Kingdom.
